amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute printed in House Report 114-49 and numbered 1 was offered as the Congressional Progressive Caucus substitute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-49 to create 8.4 million jobs, while reducing the deficit and providing a boost to America's long-term global competitiveness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 330 (Roll no. 136).

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Ellison.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Ellison.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 96 - 330 (Roll no. 136).
